interactivity.requirements: You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " The Hole That Swallowed Everything " from Yasu Yasui Seen " Blackout " from Tsuneyo Tojo
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit the New Hope Cathedral at night

progression.synopsis: Sensei goes to visit Yasu at the New Hope Cathedral, thinking strange thoughts on the way. Yasu is pleased to see him, but says that he can't go inside this time â€” God is mad at him for some reason. Instead, she talks about her beliefs on how people can serve as vessels for God's warmth, how it differs for girls and boys, and what role Sensei could play in transferring "warmth" to girls if he would only open his eyes.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .16p2.
